mapper.select: select DISTINCT a.WRITING_BATCH_ID from evaluation_sheet a left join review_signature b on a.WRITING_BATCH_ID=b.WRITING_BATCH_ID where b.REVIEW_status='0'

select DISTINCT c.examine_user,d.REVIEW_USER,e.APPRAISAL_REVIEW_USER_TWO from evaluation_sheet a LEFT JOIN writing_batch b on a.WRITING_BATCH_ID=b.WRITING_BATCH_ID LEFT JOIN data_examine c on b.report_ID=c.report_id left JOIN review_signature d ON c.report_ID=d.report_id left JOIN appraisal_review e ON c.report_ID=e.report_id where a.WRITING_BATCH_ID=#{writingBatchId}
